name: @bookingjini/bookingjini-icons
description: A custom icon font library for BookingJini

scripts.build: npm run icons:fix && npm run icons:compress && npm run icons:font

repository.url: The BookingJini Icons project is a structured repository for converting SVG icons to web fonts using `fantasticon`, `svgo`, and `oslllo-svg-fixer`. This project follows an automated workflow to ensure smooth processing, optimization, and publishing of the icons to npm.

author: Ramanujam Gond
